Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
The lobby contains the reference to all the objects needed to play a game. There are as many lobbies on the server as there are games in progress.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int id
    The unique id of the lobby
    int size
    Indicates the number of participants, which can be either 2 or 3

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Lobby​(int size, int id)

    Allows you to remove a player in the lobby.
    (package private) void start()

      void close()
      Method allows you to close the lobby and to interrupt the connections on the server-side with the clients

    • addClient

      void addClient​(java.lang.String username, ClientConnection clientConnection)
      Adds a player to the lobby
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username
      clientConnection - The player's clientConnection

    • containsUser

      boolean containsUser​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Check if a player is contained in the lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's username
      Returns:
      Returns true if the player is contained in the lobby, otherwise false

    • start

      void start()
      Create instances of remoteView, Controller and Model and launch the lobby game.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Returns:
      Returns true if the lobby is started, otherwise false

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String username)
      Allows you to remove a player in the lobby. If the lobby is in the started state, throw a RunTimeException IllegalStateException
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username

      public boolean isClose()
